title: Field Remedy: 1863
subject:
Window Glass - Visible Circular Marks on
Glass
complaint:
Circular marks may 'appear' when the glass
is damp.
cause:
Most production lines use rubber suction
heads that can leave impression marks on the glass surface.

remedyContent.text:
In case of customer complaint the glass should be polished using
a suitable proprietary mild abrasive. Substances like jewellers
rouge, certain teeth whitening products or toothpaste are
particularly suitable.
